title: MOU signed: Go to Thuththikudi by Ferry
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix By: Sudath Silva) A very significant Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) was signed between Sri Lanka and India on passenger transportation by Sea at Temple Trees on 07 January. The Secretary to the Ministry of Ports and Highways Mrs. Sujatha Cooray and the High Commissioner of India Ashok K….
